hero.title: Istanbul Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Built for airport scale, intercontinental transfer timing, and variable corridor congestion.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Treat arrival as a two-stage operation: terminal exit and district insertion.
actions: Save airport bus, metro, and taxi fallback options.
Preload route instructions for both European and Asian side.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Preserve buffer around ferry and bridge-dependent moves.
actions: Keep one non-bridge route for priority appointments.
Set transfer buffers above normal city assumptions.
Start waterfront moves earlier during weather shifts.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Operate with layered payment options and track exchange spread before converting cash.
actions: Store key addresses in offline map notes.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: If one corridor fails, pivot district sequence instead of forcing original route order.
actions: Reorder day plan by neighborhood proximity.
Prioritize indoor activities during transport slowdowns.
Stage departure with one extra transfer option.
